concept.title: Using the main menu
concept.shortdesc: The Chats screen is the default view when you log in. It displays all conversations that you currently have open.

conbody.p:
Chats with the most recent activity are displayed at the top of the list. Chat with new incoming messages are displayed at the top of the list with a badge indicating they are unread messages in the chat. For each chat in the list the following details are displayed:
The photo or initials of the chat partner
The name of the chat partner or the topic for a group chat and status information
The time of the last message on the conversation
The last message received or sent on the conversation
The number of unread messages for the conversation if applicable
The icons indicating chat settings associated with the chat
Unread badge with the number of unread messages.
Muted badge indicating that the swipe menu was used to stop sounds from playing when new messages arrive for the conversation.
Pinned badge indicating that the swipe menu was used to pin the conversation. Pinned conversations are always at the top of the active chat list.

Tap the menu icon in the upper left to display the menu item. From the menu, you can:
Change your online status
Work with your active chats
Manage and join meetings
Manage recordings
Manage your contacts
Manage app settings
Access documentation
Obtain information about the product
Report a problem and access logs
Log out

Just below the menu icon, is the filter bar. You can filter active chats by the following:
All chats
Chats with individual people
Group chats
Meeting chats for meetings that you participated All filters list the chats from last to first.
